salim 0.0.9012

Decline a German noun

Source: R/salim.gen.R
decline_noun_de.Rd

Note that this function currently doesn't support the special cases where a masculine noun gets an n or en ending attached in the accusative, dative and genitive cases.

decline_noun_de(
  noun,
  gender = c("feminine", "masculine", "neuter"),
  case = c("nominative", "genitive", "dative", "accusative")
)

Arguments

noun

The noun to decline. A character scalar.
gender

The grammatical gender of the noun.
case

The grammatical case of the noun.

Value

A character scalar.

See also

Other spoken language functions: add_definite_article_de(), definite_article_de_declined(), definite_article_de(), n_ify(), rank_nr(), write_out_n()
